job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pAre you passionate about advanced analytics and data science Do you describe yourself as an innovative problem solver Looking for an opportunity that will directly impact the customer experience at Gopuff Come join the Gopuff Data Science team and ChangeTheGameppnbspppGopuff is a highgrowth startup that is revolutionizing hyperlocal ecommerce We warehouse and deliver thousands of products to your door super fast Were currently operating in over 500 cities within the US and expanding quicklyppnbspppAs a Data Scientist at Gopuff youll build and deploy models for all sorts of highly important use cases  including predictive LTV pricing optimization and elasticity attribution predictive inventory planning operations optimization etc You will also drive changes that increase efficiencies and improve the customer experience Youll have the opportunity to make a huge impact on the future success of GopuffppnbspppWere looking for a doer problem solver and thoughtleaderpppppspanspanstrongAt Gopuff we know that life can be unpredictablestrongspan Sometimes you forget the milk at the store run out of pet food for Fido or just really need ice cream at 11 pm We get itstuff happens But thats where we come in delivering all your wants and needs in just minutesspanspanAnd now were assembling a team of motivated people to help us drive forward that vision to bring a new age of convenience and predictability to an unpredictable worldspanspanLike what youre hearing Then join us on Team BluespanemGopuff is an equal employment opportunity employer committed to an inclusive workplace where we do not discriminate on the basis of race sex gender national origin religion sexual orientation gender identity marital or familial status age ancestry disability genetic information or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws We believe in diversity and encourage any qualified individual to applyem
